change.item: Text was scanned at St. Olaf Spring, 1992.
changed numbering of erotic elegy, exordia and letters to 0. from 61, 61 and 2

split exordia and letters into separate files $Log: dem.exordia_gk.xml,v $ Revision 1.1 2009-11-16 22:16:11 rsingh04 moved more texts around based on copyright status

Revision 1.3 2003/07/01 22:15:59 yorkc Updated texts to TEI P4 and Perseus P4 extensions; minor cleanup (esp. character encodings and typos.)
Revision 1.2 2000/03/04 20:34:19 dasmith Added separate funder entity to TEI header.
Revision 1.1 2000/02/29 21:41:26 amahoney split the exordia and letters into separate files; add cards to the letters so they can chunk gracefully

div1.p:
ei) me
 peri\ kainou= tinos pra/gmatos prou)ti/qet', w)= a)/ndres *)aqhnai=oi, le/gein, e)pisxw
 a)
 e(/ws oi( plei=stoi tw=n ei)wqo/twn gnw/mhn a)pefh/nanto, ei) me
 h)/reske/ ti/ moi tw=n r(hqe/ntwn, h(suxi/an a)
 h)=gon, ei) de\ mh/, to/t' a)
 kai\ au)to\s e)peirw/mhn a(\ gignw/skw le/gein: e)peidh\ d' u(pe w(=n polla/kis ei)rh/kasin ou(=toi pro/teron, peri\ tou/twn nuni\ skopei=te, h(gou=mai kai\ prw=tos a)nasta\s ei)ko/tws a)
 meta\ tou/tous dokei=n le/gein. ei) me
 ou)=n ei)=xen kalw=s ta\ pra/gmata, ou)de
 a)
 e)/dei sumbouleu/ein: e)peidh\ d' o(/shn a(/pantes o(ra=t' e)/xei duskoli/an, w(s e)k toiou/twn peira/somai sumbouleu/ein a(\ kra/tist' ei)=nai nomi/zw. prw=ton me
 ou)=n u(ma=s e)kei=n' e)gnwke/nai dei=, w(s ou)de
 w(=n e)poiei=t' e)pi\ tou= polemei=n o)/ntes tou= loipou= prakte/on e)sti/n, a)lla\ pa/nta ta)nanti/a: ei) ga e)kei=na fau=la pepoi/hke ta\ pra/gmata, ta)nanti/' ei)ko\s belti/w poih=sai. e)/peita nomiste/on ou)x o(\s a)
 u(mi=n h)\ mhde
 h)\ mikra\ prosta/tth|, tou=ton o)rqw=s le/gein （o(ra=te ga w(s e)k tw=n toiou/twn e)lpi/dwn kai\ lo/gwn ei)s pa=n proelh/luqe moxqhri/as ta\ paro/nta）, a)ll' o(\s a)
 to\ xari/zesqai parei/s, a(\ dei= kai\ di' w(=n pausai/meq' <a)
> ai)sxu/nhn o)fliska/nontes kai\ zhmiou/menoi, tau=ta le/gh|. kai\ ga w(s a)lhqw=s, ei) me/n, o(/s' a)
 tw=| lo/gw| tis u(perbh=| luph=sai mh\ boulo/menos, kai\ ta\ pra/gmaq' u(perbh/setai, dei= pro\s h(donh
 dhmhgorei=n: ei) d' h( tw=n lo/gwn xa/ris, a)
 h)=| mh\ prosh/kousa, e)/rgw| zhmi/a gi/gnetai, ai)sxro/n e)stin fenaki/zein e(autou\s kai\ meta\ th=s e)sxa/ths a)na/gkhs pra=cai tau=q' a(\ pa/lai 'qelonta\s prosh=ken poiei=n.

ou)xi\ tau)ta\ gignw/skein, w)= a)/ndres *)aqhnai=oi, pari/statai/ moi, o(/tan te to\ th=s politei/as o)/nom' u(mw=n a)kou/sw, kai\ o(/tan to
 tro/pon o(
 prosfe/rontai/ tines u(mw=n toi=s u(pe tau/ths le/gousin i)/dw. th
 me
 ga politei/an dhmokrati/an, w(/sper a(/pantes i)/ste, o)noma/zete, tw=n de\ ta)nanti/a tau/th| lego/ntwn e)ni/ous h(/dion a)kou/ontas o(rw=. o(\ kai\ qauma/zw ti/s poq' h( pro/fasis. po/teron proi=ka le/gein tau=t' au)tou\s oi)/esqe; a)ll' oi( tw=n o)ligarxiw=n, u(pe w(=n ou(=toi le/gousin, ku/rioi kai\ plei/w siwph=s ma=llon a)
 doi=en. a)lla\ belti/w tau=t' ei)=nai tw=n e(te/rwn u(peilh/fate; belti/wn a)/r' u(mi=n o)ligarxi/a dhmokrati/as fai/netai. a)ll' au)tou\s ei)=nai belti/ous h(gei=sqe; kai\ ti/s a)
 u(f' u(mw=n xrhsto\s nomi/zoit' ei)ko/tws, e)nanti/a th=| kaqestw/sh| politei/a| dhmhgorw=n; ou)kou=n loipo
 a(marta/nein u(ma=s, o(/tan ou(/tws e)/xhte th
 gnw/mhn. tou=to toi/nun fula/ttesqe mh\ pa/sxein, w)= a)/ndres *)aqhnai=oi, o(/pws mh/ pote toi=s e)pibouleu/ousin labh
 dw/sete, ei)=ta to/t' ai)sqh/sesq' h(marthko/tes, h(ni/k' ou)d' o(tiou=n u(mi=n ple/on e)/stai.

to\ me
 [ou)=n], w)= a)/ndres *)aqhnai=oi, mh\ pa/nq' w(s a)
 h(mei=s bouloi/meq' e)/xein mh/te par' au)toi=s h(mi=n mh/te para\ toi=s summa/xois, i)/sws ou)de/n e)sti qaumasto/n: pollw=n ga to\ th=s tu/xhs au)to/maton kratei=, kai\ pollai\ profa/seis tou= mh\ pa/nta kata\ gnw/mhn sumbai/nein a)nqrw/pois ou)=sin. to\ de\ mhd' o(tiou=n metalamba/nein to
 dh=mon, a)lla\ tou\s a)ntipra/ttontas periei=nai, tou=to kai\ qaumasto/n, w)= a)/ndres *)aqhnai=oi, kai\ fobero
 toi=s eu)= fronou=sin, w(s e)gw\ kri/nw. h( me
 ou)=n a)rxh\ panto/s e)stin au(/th moi tou= lo/gou.

a)nti\ pollw=n a)/n, w)= a)/ndres *)aqhnai=oi, xrhma/twn to\ me/llon sunoi/sein u(mi=n peri\ w(=n nuni\ tugxa/nete skopou=ntes, oi)=mai pa/ntas a)
 u(ma=s e(le/sqai. o(/te toi/nun tou=q' ou(/tws e)/xei, prosh/kei pare/xein e)qe/lontas a)kou/ein u(ma=s au)tou\s tw=n boulome/nwn sumbouleu/ein: ou) ga mo/non ei)/ ti xrh/simon e)skemme/nos h(/kei tis, tou=t' a)
 a)kou/santes la/boite, a)lla\ kai\ th=s u(mete/ras tu/xhs u(polamba/nw polla\ tw=n deo/ntwn e)k tou= paraxrh=m' e)ni/ois e)pelqei=n a)
 ei)pei=n, w(/st' e)c a(pa/ntwn r(a|di/an th
 tou= sumfe/rontos u(mi=n ai(/resin gene/sqai.

e)/stin, w)= a)/ndres *)aqhnai=oi, di/kaion, e)peidh\ e)f' u(mi=n e)stin e(le/sqai tw=n r(hqe/ntwn o(/ ti a)
 bou/lhsqe, a(pa/ntwn a)kou=sai. kai\ ga polla/kis sumbai/nei to
 au)to
 a)/nqrwpon tou=to me
 mh\ le/gein o)rqw=s, e(/teron de/ ti: e)k me
 ou)=n tou= qorubei=n ta/x' a)
 dusxera/nantes pollw=n xrhsi/mwn a)posterhqei/hte, e)k de\ tou= meta\ ko/smou kai\ sigh=s a)kou=sai kai\ ta\ kalw=s e)/xonq' a(/panta poih/sete, ka)
 dokh=| tis [para]lhrei=n, paralei/yete. e)gw\ me
 ou)=n ou)/t' ei)/wqa makrologei=n, ou)/t' a)/n, ei) to
 a)/llon ei)w/qein xro/non, nu=n e)xrhsa/mhn tou/tw|, a)ll' a(\ sumfe/rein u(mi=n nomi/zw, tau=q' w(s a)
 du/nwmai dia\ braxuta/twn e)rw= pro\s u(ma=s.

o(rw= me/n, w)= a)/ndres *)aqhnai=oi, panta/pasi pro/dhlon o)
 ou(/s t' a)
 a)kou/saite lo/gous h(de/ws kai\ pro\s ou(\s ou)k oi)kei/ws e)/xete: ou) mh
 a)lla\ to\ me
 le/gein a(/ tis oi)/etai xariei=sqai tw=n parakrou/sasqai/ ti boulome/nwn ei)=nai nomi/zw, to\ d' u(fi/stasqai, peri\ w(=n pe/peiken e(auto
 sumfe/rein th=| po/lei, kai\ qorubhqh=nai ka)
 a)/llo ti bou/lhsq' u(mei=s, eu)/nou kai\ dikai/ou tou=to poli/tou kri/nw. bouloi/mhn d' a)
 u(ma=s, ei) kai\ mhde\ di' e(
 tw=n a)/llwn, di' e)kei=n' u(pomei=nai tou\s lo/gous a)mfote/rwn, i(/n' e)a
 me
 o)rqo/teron fanh=| tis le/gwn w(=n u(mei=s w(rmh/kate, xrh/shsqe tou/tw|, a)
 d' a)poleifqh=| kai\ mh\ du/nhtai dida/cai, di' au(to/n, a)lla\ mh\ di' u(ma=s ou)k e)qe/lontas a)kou/ein tou=to peponqe/nai dokh=|. e)/ti d' ou)de\ pa/qoit' a)
 a)hde\s ou)de
 tosou=ton, ei) polla/ tinos lhrou=ntos a)kou/saite, o(/son ei) tw=n deo/ntwn ti le/gein e)/xonto/s tinos ei)pei=n kwlu/saite. h( me
 ou)=n a)rxh\ tou= dokima/zein o)rqw=s a(/pant' e)sti
 mhde
 oi)/esqai pro/teron gignw/skein pri
 maqei=n, a)/llws te kai\ suneido/tas polla/kis h)/dh pollou\s metegnwko/tas. a)
 toi/nun u(mei=s tau=q' u(pa/rchte nu=n pepeisme/noi, oi)/omai meta\ braxe/wn lo/gwn kai\ au)to\s a)ntile/gein ei)ko/tws do/cein kai\ u(mi=n ta\ be/ltista fanei=sqai le/gwn.

pollw=n, w)= a)/ndres *)aqhnai=oi, lo/gwn ei)rhme/nwn para\ pa/ntwn tw=n sumbebouleuko/twn, ou)de
 u(ma=s nu=n o(rw= o)/ntas e)ggute/rw tou= ti/ prakte/on hu(rh=sqai h)\ pri
 ei)s th
 e)kklhsi/an a)nabh=nai. ai)/tion de\ tou/tou tau)/q' o(/per oi)=mai tou= kakw=s e)/xein ta\ o(/la: ou) ga parainou=sin u(mi=n u(pe tw=n paro/ntwn oi( le/gontes, a)ll' e(autw=n kathgorou=si kai\ loidorou=ntai, w(s me
 e)gw\ kri/nw, suneqi/zontes u(ma=s a)/neu kri/sews, o(/swn ei)si
 ai)/tioi kakw=n, a)kou/ein, i(/n' a)/n pot' a)/r' ei)s a)gw=na kaqistw=ntai, mhde
 h(gou/menoi kaino
 a)kou/ein, a)ll' u(pe w(=n w)/rgisqe polla/kis, prao/teroi dikastai\ kai\ kritai\ gi/gnhsqe tw=n pepragme/nwn au)toi=s. th
 me
 ou)=n ai)ti/an di' h(
 tau=ta poiou=sin, i)/sws a)no/hton a)kribw=s zhtei=n [ei)/h a)
] e)n tw=| paro/nti: o(/ti d' u(mi=n ou)xi\ sumfe/rei, dia\ tou=t' e)pitimw=. e)gw\ d' ou)/te kathgorh/sw th/meron ou)deno/s, ou)/q' u(posxh/somai toiou=t' ou)de
 o(\ mh\ paraxrh=m' e)pidei/cw, ou)d' o(/lws tw=n au)tw=n tou/tois ou)de
 poih/sw: a)ll' a(\ be/ltista me
 toi=s pra/gmasin, sumfe/ronta de\ toi=s bouleuome/nois u(mi=n h(gou=mai, tau=q' w(s a)
 du/nwmai dia\ braxuta/twn ei)pw
 katabh/somai.

oi( me
 e)painou=ntes, w)= a)/ndres *)aqhnai=oi, tou\s progo/nous u(mw=n lo/gon ei)pei=n moi dokou=si proairei=sqai kexarisme/non, ou) mh
 sumfe/ronta/ g' e)kei/nois ou(\s e)gkwmia/zousin poiei=n. peri\ ga pragma/twn e)gxeirou=ntes <le/gein> w(=n ou)d' a)
 ei(=s a)ci/ws e)fike/sqai du/naito tw=| lo/gw|, au)toi\ me
 tou= du/nasqai le/gein do/can e)kfe/rontai, th
 d' e)kei/nwn a)reth
 e)la/ttw th=s u(peilhmme/nhs para\ toi=s a)kou/ousin fai/nesqai poiou=sin. e)gw\ de\ th=s me
 e)kei/nwn a)reth=s me/giston e)/painon h(gou=mai to
 xro/non, ou(= pollou= gegenhme/nou mei/zw tw=n u(p' e)kei/nwn praxqe/ntwn ou)de/nes a)/lloi paradei/casqai dedu/nhntai: au)to\s de\ peira/somai to
 tro/pon ei)pei=n o(
 a)/n moi dokei=te ma/lista du/nasqai paraskeua/sasqai. kai\ ga ou(/tws e)/xei: ei) me
 h(mei=s a(/pantes oi( le/gontes deinoi\ fanei/hmen, ou)de
 a)
 ta\ u(me/ter' eu)= oi)=d' o(/ti be/ltion sxoi/h: ei) de\ parelqw
 <ei(=s> o(stisou=n du/naito dida/cai kai\ pei=sai, ti/s paraskeuh\ kai\ po/sh kai\ po/qen porisqei=sa xrh/simos e)/stai th=| po/lei, pa=s o( parw
 le/lutai fo/bos. e)gw\ de\ tou=to, a)
 a)/r' oi(=o/s t' w)=, peira/somai poih=sai, mikra\ proeipw
 u(mi=n w(s e)/xw gnw/mhs peri\ tw=n pro\s to
 basile/a.

a)mfo/teroi/ moi dokou=sin a(marta/nein, w)= a)/ndres *)aqhnai=oi, kai\ oi( toi=s *)arka/sin kai\ oi( toi=s *lakedaimoni/ois suneirhko/tes: w(/sper ga a)f' e(kate/rwn h(/kontes, ou)x u(mw=n o)/ntes, pro\s ou(\s a)mfo/teroi presbeu/ontai, kathgorou=sin kai\ diaba/llousin a)llh/lous. h)=n de\ tou=to me
 tw=n a)figme/nwn e)/rgon, to\ de\ koinw=s u(pe tw=n pragma/twn le/gein kai\ ta\ be/ltisq' u(pe u(mw=n skopei=n a)/neu filoniki/as tw=n e)nqa/de sumbouleu/ein a)ciou/ntwn. nu=n d' e)/gwge, ei)/ tis au)tw=n a)fe/loi to\ gignw/skesqai kai\ to\ th=| fwnh=| le/gein a)ttikisti/, pollou\s a)
 oi)=mai tou\s me
 *)arka/das, tou\s de\ *la/kwnas au)tw=n ei)=nai nomi/sai. e)gw\ d' oi)=da me
 w(s xalepo
 to\ ta\ be/ltista le/gein e)sti/n: sunechpathme/nwn ga u(mw=n, kai\ tw=n me
 tauti/, tw=n de\ tauti\ boulome/nwn, e)a
 ta\ metacu/ tis e)gxeirh=| le/gein ka)=|q' u(mei=s mh\ perime/nhte maqei=n, xariei=tai me
 ou)dete/rois, diabeblh/setai de\ pro\s a)mfote/rous: ou) mh
 a)ll' ai(rh/somai ma=llon au)to/s, e)a
 a)/ra tou=to pa/qw, dokei=n fluarei=n h)\ par' a(\ be/ltista nomi/zw th=| po/lei, proe/sqai tisi
 u(ma=s e)capath=sai. ta\ me
 ou)=n a)/ll' u(/steron, e)a
 u(mi=n boulome/nois h)=|, le/cw: e)k de\ tw=n o(mologoume/nwn u(f' a(pa/ntwn a)/rcomai a(\ kra/tista nomi/zw, dida/skein.

ou)xi\ tau)ta\ gignw/skwn e)ni/ois tw=n ei)rhko/twn a)ne/sthk', w)= a)/ndres *)aqhnai=oi. ou) mh
 ou)de\ tou/tous ai)tia/somai kaki/a| ta)nanti/a toi=s belti/stois ei)rhke/nai, a)ll' o(/ti polloi\ tou= ta\ pra/gmata kri/nein a)melh/santes tou\s lo/gous skopei=n ou(\s e)rou=sin ei)w/qasin, ka)
 tou/tois a)fqo/nois e)ntu/xwsin, e(toi/mws dhmhgorei=n, ou)k o)rqw=s e)gnwko/tes, ou)de\ logizo/menoi par' e(autoi=s o(/ti pollw=n pra/cewn e)n pollw=| xro/nw| pa=si pepragme/nwn kai\ dia\ tou\s kairou\s e)ni/wn u(penanti/wn au(tai=s, a)
 ta\s e(te/ras tis u(perbai/nwn ta\s e(te/ras le/gh|, lh/sei to\ r(a=|ston tw=n e)/rgwn poiw=n, au(to
 e)capatw=n. oi( me
 ou)=n ou(/tw xrw/menoi tw=| sumbouleu/ein dokou=si/ moi th
 a)po\ tw=n r(hqe/ntwn tou= du/nasqai le/gein do/can gignome/nhn au(toi=s i(kanh
 filotimi/an h(gei=sqai: e)gw\ de\ nomi/zw xrh=nai to
 po/lei peri\ pragma/twn e)pixeirou=nta sumbouleu/ein ma=llon o(/pws ta\ do/canta sunoi/sei skopei=n, h)\ pw=s oi( paraxrh=ma lo/goi xa/rin e(/cousi. dei= ga toi=s e)pi\ tw=n lo/gwn eu)dokimou=si sumfe/ronto/s tinos e)/rgou pra=cin prosei=nai, i(/na mh\ nu=n mo/non, a)ll' a)ei\ ta\ r(hqe/nta kalw=s e)/xh|.

ei) me
 e)gnw/kat', w)= a)/ndres *)aqhnai=oi, ti/ be/ltiston o)
 tugxa/nei pra=cai peri\ tw=n paro/ntwn, a(ma/rthma to\ sumbouleu/ein protiqe/nai: a(\ ga au)toi\ pri
 a)kou=sai dokima/zete sumfe/rein, ti/ dei= tau=t' a)kou/ontas ma/thn e)noxlei=sqai; ei) de\ skopei=te kai\ bouleu/esq' w(s e)k tw=n r(hqhsome/nwn dokima/sai de/on, ou)k o)rqw=s e)/xei to\ kwlu/ein tou\s boulome/nous le/gein. para\ me
 ga tw=n o(/lws a)posterei=sq' e)k tou= tou=to poiei=n, ei)/ ti xrh/simon e)ntequ/mhntai: tou\s d' a)fe/ntas a(\ tugxa/nousin e)gnwko/tes, w(=n u(ma=s e)piqumei=n oi)/ontai, tau=ta poiei=te sumbouleu/ein. e)/stin d' a(marta/nein me
 boulome/nwn to\ sunanagka/zein to
 pario/nq' a(\ bou/lesqe le/gein, bouleuome/nwn d' a)kou/santas a(\ gignw/skei skopei=n, ka)/n ti kalw=s e)/xh|, xrh=sqai. le/gw de\ tau=t' ou)k e)nanti/a toi=s u(mi=n a)re/skousin me/llwn parainei=n, a)ll' e)kei=n' ei)dw/s, o(/ti a)
 me
 mh\ 'qelh/shte tw=n a)ntilego/ntwn a)kou=sai, e)chpath=sqai fh/sousin u(ma=s, a)
 d' a)kou/santes mh\ peisqh=te, e)celhlegme/noi paraxrh=m' e)/sontai ta\ xei/rw parainou=ntes.

oi)/omai pa/ntas u(ma=s, w)= a)/ndres *)aqhnai=oi, gignw/skein o(/ti ou) krinou=ntes h(/kete th/meron ou)de/na tw=n a)dikou/ntwn, a)lla\ bouleuso/menoi peri\ tw=n paro/ntwn. dei= toi/nun ta\s me
 kathgori/as u(perqe/sqai pa/sas, kai\ to/t' e)n u(mi=n le/gein kaq' o(/tou pe/peiken e(/kastos e(auto/n, o(/tan tina\ kri/nwmen: ei) de/ ti/s ti xrh/simon h)\ sumfe/ron ei)pei=n e)/xei, tou=to nu=n a)pofai/nesqai. to\ me
 ga kathgorei=n toi=s pepragme/nois e)gkalou/ntwn e)sti/n, to\ de\ sumbouleu/ein peri\ tw=n paro/ntwn kai\ genhsome/nwn proti/qetai. ou)kou=n ou) loidori/as ou)de\ me/myews o( parw
 kairo/s, a)lla\ sumboulh=s ei)=nai/ moi dokei=. dio\ peira/somai me
 fula/casqai, o(\ tou/tois e)pitimw=, mh\ paqei=n au)to/s, sumbouleu/sai d' a(\ kra/tista nomi/zw peri\ tw=n paro/ntwn.

ou)de/n' <a)
> a)nteipei=n, w)= a)/ndres *)aqhnai=oi, nomi/zw, w(s ou) kakou= poli/tou kai\ fau/lou th
 gnw/mhn a)ndro/s e)stin ou(/tw tina\ misei=n h)\ filei=n tw=n e)pi\ ta\ koina\ prosio/ntwn w(/ste tou= th=| po/lei belti/stou mhde
 fronti/zein, a)lla\ ta\ me
 pro\s e)ph/reian, ta\ de\ pro\s fili/an dhmhgorei=n: a(\ poiou=sin e)/nioi tw=n deuri\ pario/ntwn. e)gw\ de\ tou/tois me
 tosou=ton a)
 ei)/poimi, o(/ti moi dokou=sin ou)d' ei)/ ti pepoih/kasin toiou=ton me/gisq' h(marthke/nai, a)ll' o(/ti dhlou=sin ou)de/pot' ou)de\ pau/sasqai pareskeuasme/noi. u(mi=n de\ parainw= mh\ proi+eme/nous u(ma=s au)tou\s i(kano
 tou=to nomi/zein, di/khn, o(/tan u(mi=n do/ch|, para\ tou/twn labei=n, a)lla\ kai\ tou/tous, o(/son e)sti
